    • Character

      public Character​(java.lang.String name, int maxHP, int damage, int lvl, int xp, java.lang.String file, int frames, java.lang.String fileBattle, int battleFrames, java.lang.String fileDeath, int deathFrames, java.lang.String atk, java.lang.String death)
      constructor for character
      Parameters:
      name - name
      maxHP - max hp
      damage - damage
      lvl - level
      xp - xp
      file - file for the animated sprite
      frames - amount of frames in the sprite
      fileBattle - file for the sprite to be used in battle
      battleFrames - frames for the battle sprite
      fileDeath - file for the death sprite
      deathFrames - frames in the death sprite
      atk - sound file for attacking
      death - sound file for dying
